templateParameters.name: actionId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the action to delete.

templateParameters.name: actionId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the action to edit.

templateParameters.name: constituentId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom the actions are to be retrieved.

templateParameters.name: actionId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the action for which information is to be retrieved.

templateParameters.name: constituentId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom the addresses are to be retrieved.

templateParameters.name: constituentId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom the attachment should be added.

templateParameters.name: constituentId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom the attachments are to be retrieved.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Optional.  Represents the number of records to return.  If not specified, the default is 100.  The maximum allowed value is 500.

queryParameters.name: offset
queryParameters.description: Optional.  Represents the number of records to skip, for use with pagination.

queryParameters.name: date_added
queryParameters.description: Optional.  Represents a filter for constituents who have been added on or after this date. This filter respects time offsets from UTC per the ISO-8601 format: 2016-05-05T17:59:31.1600745-04:00.

queryParameters.name: last_modified
queryParameters.description: Optional.  Represents a filter for constituents who have been modified on or after this date. This filter respects time offsets from UTC per the ISO-8601 format: 2016-05-05T17:59:31.1600745-04:00.

queryParameters.name: sort_token
queryParameters.description: Optional.  Represents a token filter for providing the next stable-sorted list of constituents. This will be provided on the next_link collection response property when last_modified or sort_token filters are specified on the request.

templateParameters.name: constituentId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom information is to be retrieved.

templateParameters.name: searchText
templateParameters.description: The text to search on.  Currently only supports first/middle/last names and email addresses.

templateParameters.name: constituentCodeId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent code to delete.

templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent code to edit.

templateParameters.description: The ID of the constituent for whom the name formats are to be retrieved.

templateParameters.name: noteId
templateParameters.description: The ID of the note for which information is to be retrieved.
